00211         public function setTemplate($templateCode, $templateName, $forceTemplate = FALSE) {
00212                 $this->subparts['template'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($templateCode,'###TEMPLATE_' . $templateName . '###');

00250         protected function fillMarker($term, &$markerArray, &$wrappedSubpartArray) {
00251                 $labelWrap['noTrimWrap'] = $this->configuration->offsetGet('labelWrap') ? $this->configuration->offsetGet('labelWrap') : NULL;
00252                 foreach ($term as $property => $value) {
00253                         // TODO Improve pre-processing of property-values
00254                         if (is_array($value)) {
00255                                 $value = implode(', ', $value);
00256                         }
00257                         $propertyMarker = '###' . $this->getUpperCase($property) . '###';
00258                         $markerArray[$propertyMarker] = $term[$property] ? $value : $this->pi_getLL('na');
00259                         $labelMarker = '###' . $this->getUpperCase($property) . '_LABEL###';
00260                         $markerArray[$labelMarker] = $this->cObj->stdWrap($this->pi_getLL($property), $labelWrap);
00261                 }
00262         }
00263 
00271         protected function getUpperCase($camelCase) {
00272                 return strtoupper(preg_replace('/\p{Lu}+(?!\p{Ll})|\p{Lu}/u', '_$0', $camelCase));
00273         }
